card.name: Brudiclad, Telchor Engineer
card.text: Creature tokens you control have haste. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 blue Myr artifact creature token. Then you may choose a token you control. If you do, each other token you control becomes a copy of that token.

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Coveted Jewel
card.text: When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards. {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

card.name: Echo Storm
card.text: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. You may choose new targets for the copies. Create a token that's a copy of target artifact.

card.name: Enchanter's Bane
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, target enchantment deals damage equal to its converted mana cost to its controller unless that player sacrifices it.

card.name: Forge of Heroes
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Choose target commander that entered the battlefield this turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and a loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.

card.name: Geode Golem
card.text: Trample Whenever Geode Golem deals combat damage to a player, you may cast your commander from the command zone without paying its mana cost. (You still pay any additional costs.)

card.name: Loyal Drake
card.text: Flying Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, draw a card.

card.name: Retrofitter Foundry
card.text: {3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry. {2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

card.name: Saheeli's Directive
card.text: Improvise (Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of artifact cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

card.name: Saheeli, the Gifted
card.text: +1: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. +1: The next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control as you cast it. -7: For each artifact you control, creature a token that's a copy of it. Those tokens gain haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step. Saheeli, the Gifted can be your commander.

card.name: Tawnos, Urza's Apprentice
card.text: Haste {U}{R}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control from an artifact source. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Thopter Spy Network
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Treasure Nabber
card.text: Whenever an opponent taps an artifact for mana, gain control of that artifact until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Varchild, Betrayer of Kjeldor
card.text: Whenever Varchild, Betrayer of Kjeldor deals combat damage to a player, that player creates that many 1/1 red Survivor creature tokens. Survivors your opponents control can't block, and they can't attack you or a planeswalker you control. When Varchild leaves the battlefield, gain control of all Survivors.

card.name: Vedalken Humiliator
card.text: Metalcraft - Whenever Vedalken Humiliator attacks, if you control three or more artifacts, creatures your opponents control lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
